meanings.definition: A support for the back, especially in a chair or car seat.
meanings.sent1: The chairs at the library have comfortable backrests.
meanings.sent2: I leaned back against the backrests of the car seat during the long drive.
meanings.sent3: The backrests on the chairs were so cozy, they almost put me to sleep.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a warm backrest, supporting me through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The memory foam backrests molded perfectly to my spine, relieving all tension.

meanings.definition: To provide support for the back.
meanings.sent1: She carefully backrests the pillows behind her to sit comfortably.
meanings.sent2: The ergonomic chair backrests your spine to prevent slouching.
meanings.sent3: He backrests his friends with encouraging words during their challenges.
meanings.sent4: The mountain range backrests the town, offering protection from harsh winds.
meanings.sent5: The strong tree backrests the delicate flower, shielding it from the scorching sun.
